  • Method Details

    • AABB

      public Shape AABB()
      Calculates and returns the smallest axis-aligned bounding box of the transform. This operation is costly.
      Returns:
      the smallest axis-aligned bounding box of this transform

    • getPreciseBounds

      public Shape getPreciseBounds()
      Calculates and returns the quad completely subsuming this transform. The returned shape is the shape with the smallest area.
      Returns:
      bounds of this transform
